reviews.title: Beautiful location & town
reviews.text: Beautiful location and town. The setting of this hotel is truly unique. At the top of the town, directly next to the Ponte delle Torri bridge and Rocca Albornoz fortress, with paved walking path and mountain hiking trails nearby. Small market/restaurant very near for last minute buys.

reviews.title: Charming Place
reviews.text: Room stayed in, #46, had best view of hotel with nothing between to block sight of Ponte delle Torri and rest of beautiful setting.

reviews.title: No better location, great hotel
reviews.text: Custom-made coffee service is one of highlights at breakfast, with the other being great croissants and chocolate chip coffee cake. Variety given for breakfast across our 2 night stay. Of all the hotels we walked by in Spoleto, Hotel Gattapone, I'm pretty sure, can't be beat - based on the view, service, setting, and the beauty of the actual hotel.

reviews.title: Absolutely amazing!
reviews.text: Once you navigate the winding roads this hotel is definately worth staying at. The hotel only has 15 rooms and the room was very adequate. The owner was working the desk and you could smell the breakfast being made. I was surprised at how quiet the place was - never even heard another guest, even though it was full. The town itself is a treasure, and we would definately stay here again.
